# AuthorizationStatus.approved

**Case**

The user, parent, or guardian approved the request for authorization.

## Declaration

```swift
case approved
```

## Determining the Status

- **AuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: The app hasn’t requested authorization.
- **AuthorizationStatus.denied**: The user, parent, or guardian denied the request for authorization.

items.description: The user, parent, or guardian denied the request for authorization.
items.name: AuthorizationStatus.denied
